berdan.description: A middle aged man with a wispy bowl cut and small rimmed glasses. He is writing in the ledger with incredible speed.
berdan.response: If you'd like to be a ship owner, you need to have a ship license. You can buy one here but it isn't cheap. Once you have a license, you'll need to procure a ship, either by building one or buying one. You'll also need one license per owned ship. Please ask me about my goods if you'd like to buy one.
